resources.string: Each level will have a number of moves (same as the level) which you must determine.
If you tap the correct direction, a green light will appear, a ding will sound and you can make the next move.
If it is incorrect, a red light will appear, a buzz will sound and your sequence will reset.
You may proceed to the next level if you find the correct sequence.
You may proceed to the next level if you find the correct sequence. (Tap anywhere to continue)

I am a first year student at U of T Scarborough, studying Computer Science. This app is my first app, and I will continue to develop more in the future. I hope you enjoy the app. Special thanks to dmf444 for helping me in the development of this app, and to ThatGuy for trying to break the app.

! am a first year student at U of T Scarborough, studying Computer Science. This app is my first app, and ! will continue to develop more in the future. ! hope you enjoy the app. Special thanks to dmf444 for helping me in the development of this app, and to ThatGuy for trying to break the app.
I do not own any of the rights to the pictures or music for this app. All rights reserved to their respective owners. This app has no intention of monetary gain.
Finish as many levels as you can in the given time
Finish the given levels as fast as you can
Are you sure you want to leave? Your progress will not be saved (Your highscore will be saved)
\"The classic. If you\'re using this you\'ve probably unlocked nothing.\"
\"The inverted set. Keys are the wrong way yknow. Green is bad, and red is good. Simple.\"
\"The invisible set. Yeah. I\"m sure you\'ll find a way to use this.\"
\"Simon says press yellow. Or red. Or blue. Or green. Just pick the right one.\"
\"The PC gamer. WASD you know it. \"
\"The Y-Box gamer. Like Y-Box 360, Y-Box One, the game Hay Low, all that.\"
\"The Paystation gamer. PS1, PS2, PS3, PS4, Big Little Planet.\"
\"The card dealer. Heart, diamonds, clubs, spades. Ace it or be a joke(r).\"
\"The Dans Dans Revolution skin. Make sure to time it right, er well actually it doesn\'t really matter.\"
Have this skin as a gift, it\'s on the house.
Score at least 5 in classic or time attack.
Score at least 10 in classic or time attack.
Score at least 10 in time attack.
Score at least 10 in time attack.
Achieve a time of under 20 seconds for beat the clock level 5.
Achieve a time of under 40 seconds for beat the clock level 7.
